name: HSP_PRE_AR_TX
description: This table contains hospital billing temporary transaction information. This table is limited to charge temporary transactions that have not yet been posted to the account.

columns.name: HTT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CHARGE_PROC_ID
columns.description: The procedure code associated with the transaction line.

columns.name: TX_COMMENT
columns.description: The comment associated with the transaction line.

columns.name: CHARGE_DESCRIPTION
columns.description: The description of the procedure associated with the transaction line.

columns.name: HCPCS_CODE
columns.description: The HCPCS Code associated with the transaction line.

columns.name: NDC_ID
columns.description: The medication ID associated with the transaction line.

columns.name: NDC_ID_NDC_CODE
columns.description: The external code for the National Drug Code (NDC). An NDC represents packages of medications.

columns.name: HIPPS_CODE
columns.description: The HIPPS Code associated with the transaction line.

columns.name: HIPPS_CODE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The HIPPS code type associated with the transaction line.

columns.name: MODIFIERS
columns.description: This column stores the modifiers for a procedure.

columns.name: HIPPS_CODE_DESC
columns.description: The HIPPS code description associated with the transaction line.

columns.name: MEDICATION_ID
columns.description: The medication ID associated with the transaction line.

columns.name: REV_CODE_ID
columns.description: The revenue code associated with the transaction line.

columns.name: REV_CODE_ID_REVENUE_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the revenue code.

columns.name: SUP_ID
columns.description: The Supply ID associated with the transaction line.

columns.name: SUP_ID_SUPPLY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the inventory item.

columns.name: SERVICE_DATE
columns.description: The column displays the service date associated with the transaction line.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The patient contact associated with the transaction line.

columns.name: PX_MED_NECESSITY_YN
columns.description: Flag denoting whether or not the procedure is medically necessary.

columns.name: QUANTITY
columns.description: Stores the number of units or days that this procedure was performed.

columns.name: PROC_START_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the start date and time of the procedure.

columns.name: PROC_END_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the date and time that the procedure stopped.

columns.name: TX_AMOUNT
columns.description: The charge amount associated with the transaction line.

columns.name: DEFAULT_PRICE
columns.description: The default price associated with the transaction line.

columns.name: DFLT_REV_CODE_ID
columns.description: The default revenue code associated with the transaction line.

columns.name: DFLT_REV_CODE_ID_REVENUE_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the revenue code.

columns.name: DURATION_MINUTES
columns.description: Stores duration of service in minutes for the transaction line.

columns.name: PANEL_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID for the associated panel.

columns.name: DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The department override associated with the transaction line.

columns.name: POS_ID
columns.description: The charge place of service associated with the transaction line.

columns.name: RESEARCH_ID
columns.description: The research study associated with the transaction line.

columns.name: RSH_STUDY_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description: The research study source associated with the transaction line.
entries: Set by System Based on Patient Encounter
Set by System Based on Patient Research Timeline
Set by System Based on Treatment Plan
Set by System Based on Treatment Plan Without Billing Match
Set by System Based on Encounter Service

columns.name: RSH_MOD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Charge line's research billing modifier type. Normally, research charges with this value set should file to the patient account in order to be billed to insurance.

columns.name: RSH_CHG_ROUTE_C_NAME
columns.description: This column specifies where to route the research charge.

columns.name: REFERENCE_AMT
columns.description: Holds the reference amount that is calculated based on the financial class for the charge. This is set by the system and is applicable only to charges.

columns.name: REFERENCE_AMT_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description: Holds the source of the reference amount that is used in the calculation of the reference amount. This is set by the system and is applicable only to charges.

columns.name: INST_PAT_NAME
columns.description: The institutional patient name associated with the transaction line.

columns.name: INST_BIRTH_DATE
columns.description: The institutional patient date of birth associated with the transaction line.

columns.name: INST_EMP_NUMBER
columns.description: The institutional employee number associated with the transaction line.

columns.name: INST_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description: The legal gender for the institutional patient associated with the transaction line.

columns.name: INST_COMMENT
columns.description: A comment stored in a charge transaction. If a hospital account's guarantor is of a type that is considered institutional, then certain pieces of institutional billing-related information can be stored in charges filed on that hospital account.

columns.name: INSTI_LINK_PAT_SN
columns.description: A linked patient serial number stored in a charge transaction. If a hospital account's guarantor is of a type that is considered institutional, then certain pieces of institutional billing-related information can be stored in charges filed on that hospital account. A linked patient serial number is one such piece of information. It is the patient serial number from which the data in the institutional billing-related information was pulled by the user while filling in those fields.

columns.name: SERVICE_AUTH_ID
columns.description: The CoCM service decision authorization record associated with this charge.

columns.name: PANEL_DT
columns.description: The contact date of the panel procedure that is associated with this transaction.

columns.name: PANEL_DAT
columns.description: The contact date of the panel procedure that is associated with this transaction, in decimal format. Used to link with the CLARITY_EAP_OT table.

columns.name: RESEARCH_ENROLL_ID
columns.description: Research study association per charge line.
